name: Pasur11
description:
Pasur (Card Game)

The most favourite Pasur game ever.

- Two players and four players mode: in four players mode, you would collect points with the help of your AI ally.
- Highly intelligent AI: Playing against clever AI, you can challenge your Pasur skills. AI has no idea about your cards, and it analyses the game itself. Can you beat it?
- Resume ability: You can pick up the previous game where you left it.
- Settings: You can set up the game speed, turn on and off the game sounds and you can also choose from multiple pool and cards designs. You also can turn on the ability to undo surs by surs.

At the end of each game the points will be shown separately for each player(team).

Tips:
play with the AI.
No in app purchase.
